scripts.build:copy-assets: mkdir -p topicdeck/server/public && cp -R node_modules/topicdeck/dist/server/public/* topicdeck/server/public && cp -R public/* topicdeck/server/public
scripts.now-build: npm run build:copy-assets && npm run build:serviceworker
scripts.gcp-build: npm run build:copy-assets && npm run build:serviceworker
